rows.label: qev060801_MSG0001
rows.name:
This device seems fairly advanced, doesn't it?
It's all a a bit over my head...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060801_MSG0002
rows.name:
Um, hello? You there? Is there any chance you are
familiar with the workings of Zaruboggan technology?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060801_MSG0003
rows.name: If so, maybe you could...teach me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060801_JNK0010
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev060801_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Nococche what she's attempting to repair.

rows.label: qev060801_JNK0020
rows.name: Suggest

rows.label: qev060801_SEL0021
rows.name: Tell Nococche she just needs to give it a good smack.

rows.label: qev060801_MSG0004
rows.name: Oh! You're also the curious type?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060801_MSG0005
rows.name:
Well, I thought I would try my hand at repairing the
backpack Atheron is always wearing, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060801_MSG0006
rows.name:
But sadly, I'm at at something of an impasse.
I was hoping you might be able to help shed some
light on the subject?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060801_MSG0007
rows.name:
We Zaruboggan use these to strip contaminants from
voltant to ensure we devoltanize only uniform, untainted
impurities. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060801_MSG0008
rows.name:
If compromised by other substances, the process could
be fatal. *fsssh* This is why it is most urgent that the
backpack be repaired.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060801_MSG0009
rows.name:
Oh my. If you don't mind my saying so,
that seems a bit...uncivilized, perhaps?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060801_MSG0010
rows.name:
Not to offend, but that sort of simplistic, lazy thinking
is one human trait I simply can't come to love.
...That didn't offend, did it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060801_MSG0011
rows.name:
For starters, this backpack plays a crucial role in
filtering the voltant the Zaruboggan need to live, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060801_MSG0012
rows.name:
If I were to strike it and something were to break,
it could be a terrible tragedy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060801_MSG0013
rows.name:
It could even cost me my life! *fsssh* So no.
I'd prefer to stick with less violent methods myself, too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060801_MSG0014
rows.name:
Hmm... I might be able to make do with an all-purpose
plug, maybe?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060801_MSG0015
rows.name:
Perhaps that's where you can come in?
Could I convince you to find one for me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060801_MSG0016
rows.name:
My friend's life hangs in the balance on this repair job,
you see? Or it very well might, at any rate.
So will you help me fix his backpack?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060801_MSG0017
qev060801_MSG0018
rows.name:
I'll have this thing picked apart and understood,
and won't rest until it's repaired! That sounds good,
doesn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060801_MSG0019
rows.name:
I was certain there wasn't a machine in all of space
that a Ma-non couldn't understand...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060801_MSG0020
rows.name: But this one might be out of my element?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060801_MSG0021
rows.name:
Have you located an all-purpose plug? Because I think
that will let me finish the repairs, hopefully?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060801_MSG0022
rows.name: Any luck finding that all-purpose plug?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060801_MSG0023
rows.name:
I have a decent grasp on the backpack's general design
at this point, you know? So once I receive that plug,
I should probably have it working again in no time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060801_MSG0024
rows.name:
That's the one!
I'll start the repairs immediately...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060801_MSG0025
rows.name:
I think there was a voltant leak inside the backpack.
Which probably explains the odd smell, doesn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060801_MSG0026
rows.name:
Does it look like you can fix it? *fsssh*
That would be wonderful.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060801_MSG0027
rows.name:
You're always so nice to me. *fsssh*
Are all Ma-non this kind?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060801_MSG0028
rows.name:
Er, probably not? Unlike you serious Zaruboggan,
the Ma-non tend to space out on promises, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060801_MSG0029
rows.name:
You might have a better idea about all this, actually.
How do we Ma-non seem to a human like you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060801_JNK0030
rows.name: Approve

rows.label: qev060801_SEL0031
rows.name: Give a positive description.

rows.label: qev060801_JNK0040
rows.name: Disapprove

rows.label: qev060801_SEL0041
rows.name: Give a critical description.

rows.label: qev060801_MSG0030
rows.name:
*fsssh* Absolutely! I couldn't find anyone so eager to
help me even among my own people.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060801_MSG0031
rows.name:
And I may just have to add you to that list as well.
Has anyone mentioned that you have a certain
Ma-non-ness about you? *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060801_MSG0032
rows.name:
*fsssh* Well sure, they don't do much besides eating
pizza, tinkering with machines, and acting all wishy-
washy. But I think that just adds to their charm.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060801_MSG0033
rows.name:
Though you seem more serious than most humans I've
met, so I can see how they might bother you. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060801_MSG0034
rows.name:
Well, I feel that a sincere Zaruboggan like you is easier
to get along with than most of my colleagues, if that
makes sense?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060801_MSG0035
rows.name: And...there? Okay. The repairs are done.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060801_MSG0036
rows.name:
I only ask that you treat it with a...
Well, with a little more care?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060801_MSG0037
rows.name: Hmm...? That's...strange.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060801_MSG0038
rows.name: Mmy body...not rrrspondg...nrrrrkgt...ggk...?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060801_MSG0039
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]
